mapper.sql: id, apply_id, infusion_time, executor_id, executor_name, execute_time, finish_flag, evaluation, pay_flag, payer_id, payer_name, cleared, note
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pension_infusion_record
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pension_infusion_record (id, apply_id, infusion_time, executor_id, executor_name, execute_time, finish_flag, evaluation, pay_flag, payer_id, payer_name, cleared, note) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infusionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
apply_id,

mapper.update:
update pension_infusion_record
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_id = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
infusion_time = #{record.infusionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
executor_id = #{record.executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
executor_name = #{record.executorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
execute_time = #{record.executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_flag = #{record.finishFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaluation = #{record.evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_flag = #{record.payFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payer_id = #{record.payerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payer_name = #{record.payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cleared = #{record.cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update pension_infusion_record set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_id = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, infusion_time = #{record.infusionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, executor_id = #{record.executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, executor_name = #{record.executorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, execute_time = #{record.executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_flag = #{record.finishFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluation = #{record.evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_flag = #{record.payFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payer_id = #{record.payerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payer_name = #{record.payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cleared = #{record.cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pension_infusion_record
apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
infusion_time = #{infusionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
executor_id = #{executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
executor_name = #{executorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_flag = #{finishFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
evaluation = #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_flag = #{payFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payer_id = #{payerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payer_name = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pension_infusion_record set apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, infusion_time = #{infusionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, executor_id = #{executorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, executor_name = #{executorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_flag = #{finishFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluation = #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_flag = #{payFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payer_id = #{payerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payer_name = #{payerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select pr.id as id, pr.infusion_time as infusionTime, pr.apply_id as applyId, pr.executor_name as executorName, pr.execute_time as executeTime, pr.finish_flag as finishFlag, pr.pay_flag as payFlag, pr.payer_name as payerName, po.name as olderName, po.id as olderId
from pension_infusion_record pr, pension_older po, pension_infusion_apply pa where pr.cleared=2 and pr.apply_id and po.cleared=2 and pa.cleared=2 and pa.id=pr.apply_id and pa.older_id=po.id
and unix_timestamp(pr.infusion_time) >=unix_timestamp(#{startDate})
and unix_timestamp(date_add(#{endDate}, interval 1 day)) >unix_timestamp(pr.infusion_time)

select pr.id as id, pr.infusion_time as infusionTime, pr.apply_id as applyId, pr.executor_name as executorName, pr.execute_time as executeTime, pr.finish_flag as finishFlag, pr.pay_flag as payFlag, pr.payer_name as payerName, po.name as olderName, po.id as olderId
from pension_infusion_record pr, pension_older po, pension_infusion_apply pa where pr.cleared=2 and pr.apply_id and po.cleared=2 and pa.cleared=2 and pa.id=pr.apply_id and pa.older_id=po.id and pr.apply_id=#{applyId}
